title: My experience
text: Great app and all Airbnb support and Ambassadors are amazing, knowingly will solve any issue and continuously contact me till the matter is solved

title: Air bnb invaded my privacy
text: Everything about you and your information is not safe with airbnb total fraud

title: Cleaning fees?
text: Why am i expected to clean the room and pay 200 dollars for a cleaning fee. Trash app

title: Advertised price not even close real final price
text: Show the full price up front and quit wasting peoples’ time by advertising a low nightly rate when the real rate is often 250% more due to arbitrary fees.

title: Horrible stays
text:
Booked a three day stay on airbnb, first time trying this in NYC. The host was horrible and locked us out, and airbnb wouldn’t refund anything. Had to get a last minute hotel in the middle of winter.

Hotels are there for a reason. Don’t try airbnb unless you are prepared to lose all your money.

title: Feels like a scam
text:
How amazing and horrible experiences with the private hosts wouldn’t be it still can’t change the fact that Airbnb’s help center is useless.
Every communication with the support is painful and it feels just easier to switch to another platform even if it’s more expensive or has worse listings just because it feels extremely unsafe to book anything with Airbnb knowing that your are on your own if any issue occurs. My last communication with the support staff included name calling, rude unprofessional style of communication and it took me three tries to finally make it clear for them what was my question about. And still I wasn’t able to receive any useful response about my issue. 
The platform itself is developed very poorly and it’s really hard to find accommodation with such a little amount of filters. A lot of things feel like scam, like new accounts get lower service fees, comparing to other platforms that give you discounts if you stay with them longer and if you book more. 
In general very disappointing service however unfortunately other rental platforms are less popular and most hosts use Airbnb. It’s hard to find an alternative but still might be a better option .

title: Seguros Falsos
text:
Soy Anfitrion en Airbnb y me pasaron una multa por malos tratos de parte de un huésped.
Tengo el ticket de la multa y valor del cobro del gasto, los envié mediante un reclamo y aún Airbnb no me quiere reembolsar el dinero, sino que me indican que es el huésped quien debe pagarlo.
¡Los seguros de AIRBNB NO EXISTEN!

title: Great app as host and guest w/ one major suggestion
text:
Have been hosting a year and also used as guest. Both interfaces are great. 

From host side, one major suggestion that would be a game changer is being able to block check-in and check-out for specific days, such as holidays, but not completely block so guests can reserve as part of a multi-day stay. This would be tremendous help to manage turnover.

title: New “high safety risks” restriction is ridiculous
text:
I’ve used air bnb for 6 years and have a 5 star rating from all the hosts I’ve had. 
I went to book an air bnb for 9 people in a place that fits 12.
I was blocked by air bnb from making this booking.
I messaged the host asking if they could override this and they responded “you’ll have to contact air bnb. we are unable to override them from our end. We would be happy to host you though!”
So… even though I have a PERFECT rating and the host wants to make money by having us stay at their place (the whole point of this app) air bnb is going to block me because they have “implemented restrictions that prevent guests from making reservations when the system detects that booking may present higher safety risks”
This is absolutely ridiculous to me. 
Air bnb also says “but you do still have options in finding another booking, as these restrictions don't apply to hotel or private room listings”
The whole reason I started staying at air bnbs is due to it being a bigger space with a kitchen and other amenities at a cheaper than hotels.
As a long time user, this is the first time I’ve reconsidered using air bnb ever again. I’ll be looking into other apps such as VRBO.

title: Unable to view inbox through the app
text: Only works in the browser. I tried to report a problem, but I wasn’t able to select the options needed to complete it.

title: Bugs in the system
text: It won’t let me reply to a guest reviews on the app. Yet, it will on my husbands phone. I keeps saying to leave the guest a review even after it’s been done and published.

title: Still waiting on refund
text: Host cancelled my trip. Airbnb took my money and still has not refunded me. I need my refund to book another trip somewhere else.

title: Worst support system
text:
My fiancé booked a room for us and I flew in before her to check in and set up. To my surprise I’ve found out that the host had amended the reservation without informing us and Airbnb support team was useless and they did not fix the issue nor did they help. They claim that since I’m the second guest and not the “main guest” they can’t help or do anything about it. Why have the option to add a second guest on the reservation? Why can’t Airbnb be more reliable and helpful? Why do they have crooks on their app?!!! 
Btw, properties listed on Airbnb are more expensive than they really are.

title: Scam Host
text:
Beware of Airbnb and the host on this app. I have booked a place on Christmas and the apartment smell like weed. When I complained the host denied to return my money and Airbnb refused to allow guest who paid money to leave a review. You are better off going to a hotel. The service fee they have in the place allow them to scam you out of money even when.

Be highly careful using this app. The Airbnb rep don’t resolve anything. They allow the host to dictate what the want and will put you and your family in danger.

title: Worst app
text: I had some trouble at my  resorts. Things were not as described and Airbnb was no help at all this was the second time Airbnb was no help to me . I had worst experience using this app.

title: This app drives me crazy
text:
I constantly have “1” number next to the app icon. It randomly shows that I have an unread message, or unseen notification or need to download a new version. And even if I finish all those side quest, there’s still that annoying “1” notification on app icon. 
I learn to ignored it, so it made me miss so many messages from host because it never changes the number of notifications whenever I have real messages waiting or not. 
Pls fix already, i have that issue for years.

title: Decent service, bad UI
text: Service is good, but the UI is very bad on phones, with consistent popup ads for unrelated features, and menu bars consistently vanishing

title: Left my family stranded due to racist policies
text: Denied my family the right to stay at a location due to the fact we’re primarily black.

title: Ridiculous new rules
text:
I have enjoyed using Airbnb for years now, but their new rules are getting ridiculous. 

I went to book a stay for my friends and me recently and was told by Airbnb that it could not be booked because of the probability of an unauthorized party. 

Mind you, I have had great reviews at every stay over the last 5 years because my guests and I go out of our way to ensure we leave the homes as we found them. I understand trying to prevent parties, but why have homes that sleep 8+ people if you’re not going to allow people to book with that many guests? Make it make sense.

title: Unauthorized guests & no support
text: Be careful if you are going to host through air bnb they do NOT support landlords and let guests do what they please at your home. We had a guest and they brought extra people and backed up our trash with their extra mess trash and no one helped us. They claim if and only if the guests wants to pay then one can get reimbursed. What kind of business is that!! Very bad business and no host support very biased and unfair. We have unlisted and just rented our home the traditional manner. Do not trust or let them brain wash you with all the 3rd world individuals they have as customer service is the worst I can barley understand what they are saying and if one wants to rebuttal or defend your self because everything will be a tug a war, well good luck! Everything is a struggle , fight and tedious endless trace of people you have to speak to and call. It’s impossible to get any help. BEWARE!

title: Do not install this is app shady business
text:
This is a shady business if you book with them be cautious you will find out that people who post love to false advertise their Home ! 

Shady people run air bnb’s ! 
Air bnb employees are shady ! 
Do not install !!!

title: Tracks location
text: App tracks location even though I have not given it permission

title: Terrible customer support
text: Customer for years and now not able to book. After over a week of using the chat, talking to reps, and the message service no resolution. Verified id entity, sent a selfie, waited 24 hours as suggested, tried four payment methods many times, and still no resolution. Worst customer support experience I’ve had.  Will move on to other services.

title: Fees are outrageous!
text: Cleaning fees and Airbnb fees have skyrocketed over the past few years. Would be better to include costs related to fees in the nightly price.

title: Exploitative Hosts
text: I have used airbnb since 2015, in numerous different countries. This month, I had a host message me with a sketchy link asking me to fill out my “Boarding Pass” to verify my identity, which I had never heard of. The hosts (beware of Salman, Luxana, Shane, & Shane if you’re in the Philadelphia, PA area) blatantly lied to me, saying that information would not be stored or used for any other purpose— a quick look into “Enso Connect” shows how untrue that is. They share all your information including banking/payment details with their “clients” and store it indefinitely in “Amazon Web Services.” When I reached out to Airbnb about this exploitative behavior— they did nothing to protect me or my trip, nor did they do anything to correct this behavior of the Hosts. If Airbnb already verifies my identity— why allow hosts to require their own verification, especially when it seems like I’m risking identity theft. After nearly ten years of happy airbnb usage, I’m saddened to delete the app, but am shocked and displeased by the lack of costumer support and protection.

title: Scammy practices by Airbnb
text: Was viewing a listing and refreshed the page. The price went up. I thought it was a bug so I refreshed again and the price went up again. Super scammy practices by Airbnb. Not sure I will book again. Be careful everyone.

title: Customer Service
text:
Unfortunately Airbnb has one of the most ineffective customer service departments that exist. If everything is ok with your reservation then there’s no issue. But if you ever have to get them involved it’s a total disaster:
A complete lack of effort every time.

title: Events
text: App didn’t let me book for the days 30-1 due to them saying may lead to “unauthorized partying the home” while it was only for me and another person. Resham B. Was the person that did not help at all ! Thanks

title: Support?
text:
Absolutely worst customer support I’ve ever dealt with. I rarely judge a company by their support team and often overlook bad reviews when they discuss issues with support. But this has been absolutely crazy. 

Opened a support chat with them and was told responses usually take “a few minutes”. I received a response the next day at 5am. Their response simply asked for more information, I provided it to them, received my next response 9 hours later. We have been going back and forth for three days at this point receiving just about 2 messages back from them each day despite responding immediately on my end. 

If you’re willing to gamble, the app works fine. But if you run into ANY issues just know you’re screwed if it involves their support team.

I recommend taking your time and money elsewhere, there are plenty of airbnb competitors out there and often with identical properties.

title: First time experience is excellent
text: Dealing with the Hosts has been excellent and they have been very responsive.

title: Doesn’t make sense
text: Doesn’t make sense that a company this big hasn’t fixed some bugs in their map. Nah it’s not one star it’s more like 3.5 I just had to give a one to draw attention and drop the average. Map feature is frustrating to work with and there’s other bugs.

title: Ripped off by Air B N B
text: I got ripped off for cancelling a reservation 10 minutes after I requested to book it. The host took my $110 and wouldn’t refund me. When I called and asked to stay the night anyway and rebook like the host told me to air b n b was no help, they wouldn’t rebook it for me and told me I was out of luck if the host doesn’t refund me. Do yourself a favor and book a hotel that won’t rip you off. So after air b n b took my $110 and wouldn’t refund me OR let me stay at the place I PAID FOR, I had to book a $160 hotel. The cherry on top is that they won’t even let me give a negative review of the host because it wasn’t a “stay” since I cancelled.

title: Suppressing customer reviews
text: I recently stayed at a Swedish cottage in Lake Tahoe ( hosted by Debra) and my people in my party contracted PINK EYE and the host was super rude and intrusive. Therefore I left a review accurately describing my disgust with the place and the host then Airbnb called saying because she is a super host and only gets 5 stars they are going to remove my review! I would rather stay in my car then an Airbnb again!!

title: Negative experience as a host, and as a traveler
text: I’ve had nothing but negative experiences with Airbnb. The company cannot be relied on to remedy issues for hosts, or for guests. I’ve had multiple instances of theft, insufficient, sleeping conditions… Damage… And the Airbnb company/help center in the app has been nothing more than a place to document this with no follow up.

title: A dangerous investment
text: Airbnb provided a copy and paste response to a life threatening issue.

title: Toxic hosts
text: Better hope you have a good host.

title: Needs a no party / party allowed filter
text: Needs a filter to determine if property allows parties.

title: App needs work
text: They try to pigeon hole you into certain things like you can’t just search for all rentals in x area. You have to choose beach house or hut or cabin. They also sway you towards the hosts they want. It’s frustrating

title: App fails on Apple
text: Unable to use my mobile device to access the app which defeats the purpose of the app. App says update but no update available. Website options. Not very user friendly. Too bad.

title: Easy, fast, & good cancellation policy
text: What the title said

title: Poor Customer Service
text: Customer service representatives do not speak English proficiently. We had a serious issue and we couldn’t get any help from the support. Please use people to actually speak English fluently it’s disrespectful to your customers.

title: If I could I’d give this 0 stars
text: Not only did they not issue me a refund because of a family death I had to cancel they didn’t even give me anything back for a refund. They took a whole week to talk to me about getting a refund only to tell me that I wouldn’t receive one because of the hosts policy. That is just horrible to do I paid alot of money for a place I didn’t even get to stay at. Never will I ever do business with shady organizations like this. I urge you folks to do the same. Especially if you have circumstances like mines with a family death and airbnb not giving you your money back.

title: This app is Excrement.
text: Tried reserving a place for the first time in my life and I can’t because somehow I’m already flagged and every place I try to get is turning me down making me feel discriminated for my age or maybe race.

title: Used to love it. Now it's ridiculous
text: I have never had an issue with Airbnb until recently. I have kept being denied being able to book and NOBODY KNOWS WHAT MY RESTRICTION IS. I keep being told to verify my identity and it's already verified. The last time I booked was 2021. Now this year I need a larger space to travel to a quick local destination and BOOM they think it's a party . It's kids and two chaperones. I'm over it no one is willing to understand in support and even the hosts that I was honest and intentional with are confused on why I can't book. It's SICKENING. Because now I have to try and book hotels rooms near a busy area which will cost way more. I'm disappointed and won't be using them until they fix that bug.

title: Fraudulent app and Fradulent host by BHANU
text: I’m writing to warn everyone about Indian host in Kitchener, Ontario for Scamming of $318 and he was added by the support staff of Air BNB. The app should be blacklisted permanently. Imagine making full payments for six nights and mistakenly mixed up the date of arrival and The host refused to refund my money or change the date. Support staff of the Air BNB aided fraud and I demanded that BHANU a Homeowner be blacklist and asked to refund my money in full for not offering any services as agreed.

title: rude unwelcoming hosts
text: i found this app to be unfriendly and hostile especially with the hosts . they treat their home like as if it was a hotel when in all reality it’s not at all . the services they provide aren’t at all what a hotel does and they recently have started charging more than a hotel . this app is full of scammers and most listings are catfish . i would avoid and just do a hotel with proper service and reception x

title: They delete negative reviews
text: When the host had horrible communication, charged last minute fees to get access to the property, and refused to issue a refund. My review was deleted/not showing on the property. How are we supposed to know where to book if you take down 1 star reviews?

title: Trash policy.
text: Airbnb is trash. They cancelled my reservation and now I gotta wait 15 days to get my money back. Never will use again. Vrbo is better.

title: TRASH APP TO USE
text: YOU ARE BETTER OFF GOING TO A HOTEL BOOKING APP BECAUSE AIRBNB APP ITS SELF IS VERY DISCRIMINATING I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND USING THIS APP !

title: Promotes genocide & Steals homes
text: This app is currently being sued for giving homes to illegal settlers. If you want to lose your property DO not use this app.
